entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening then changing to rain overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
